base.name: Debian 7 Wheezy Desktop KDE
base.author: Z. Cliffe Schreuders
base.description: Based on the Official Puppet Vagrant box. Debian 7.8 (wheezy) 32-bit (i386), Puppet 4.3.2 / Puppet Enterprise 2015.3.2 (agent). Plus KDE and some useful tools. For testing purposes, the default root password is puppet.
